project.name: Car Rent
project.description: Web-based platform that allows users to search, book, and manage car rentals from various providers, providing a convenient and efficient solution for transportation needs.

project.name: Task Manager
project.description: Web application that enables users to manage task, assign tasks to team members, and track task progress and plan project milestones.

project.name: Trip Guide
project.description: A comprehensive travel booking platform that allows users to book flights, hotels, and rental cars, and offers curated recommendations for popular destinations.
